targets.expr: topk(1, sum((node_time_seconds - node_boot_time_seconds) * on(instance) group_left(node_name) node_meta{}) by (node_name))

100 - sum(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[1m]) * on(instance) group_left(node_name) node_meta{}) * 100 / count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user"} * on(instance) group_left(node_name) node_meta{})
100-sum((node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes) * on(instance) group_left(node_name) node_meta{} * 100) / count(node_meta * on(instance) group_left(node_name) node_meta{})

panels.title: Analyzer on network by board type

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(IDAnalyseur) AS v FROM applicationqm

SELECT
ROUND (   
        (
            LENGTH(toto.Variable)
            - LENGTH( REPLACE ( toto.Variable, "CNH3-", "") ) 
        ) / LENGTH("CNH3-")        
    )-1 AS 'v'
FROM
(SELECT qm.IDAnalyseur , qm.Variable
				FROM
				    applicationqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listeaffectation AS lsta,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def,
            apprack AS rack,
            qmrack AS qmr
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lsta.NoSerieARM
				    AND lsta.NoSerieAnalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
            AND rack.idserieqm = qm.IDAnalyseur
            AND qmr.id = rack.idRack
            AND def.NomAnalyseur LIKE '%NH3%'
GROUP BY qm.IDAnalyseur, qm.Variable) AS toto

SELECT
ROUND (   
        (
            LENGTH(toto.Variable)
            - LENGTH( REPLACE ( toto.Variable, "CTRS-", "") ) 
        ) / LENGTH("CTRS-")        
    )-1 AS 'v'
FROM
(SELECT qm.IDAnalyseur , qm.Variable
				FROM
				    applicationqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listeaffectation AS lsta,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def,
            apprack AS rack,
            qmrack AS qmr
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lsta.NoSerieARM
				    AND lsta.NoSerieAnalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
            AND rack.idserieqm = qm.IDAnalyseur
            AND qmr.id = rack.idRack
            AND def.NomAnalyseur LIKE '%TRS%'
GROUP BY qm.IDAnalyseur, qm.Variable) AS toto
SELECT 'MP101M' as 'Analyser', 25 as 'Testing place'

SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(def.NomAnalyseur, "_Bc", "") as 'Analyser', SUM(rack.nbplace) as 'Testing place'
				FROM
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def,
				    qmrack as rack
				WHERE
				    rack.idtypeapp = def.idanalyseur
GROUP BY NomAnalyseur, rack.nbplace, rack.idtypeapp

SELECT NomAnalyseur as 'Analyser', COUNT(IDAnalyseur) as 'In test'
FROM
(SELECT qm.IDAnalyseur, def.NomAnalyseur
				FROM
				    applicationqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listeaffectation AS lsta,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def,
            apprack AS rack,
            qmrack AS qmr
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lsta.NoSerieARM
				    AND lsta.NoSerieAnalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
            AND rack.idserieqm = qm.IDAnalyseur
            AND qmr.id = rack.idRack
            AND (qmr.visurack = 0 OR qmr.visurack IS null)
GROUP BY qm.IDAnalyseur, def.NomAnalyseur) AS TOTO
GROUP BY NomAnalyseur

SELECT
"CNH3e" AS 'Analyser',
ROUND (   
        (
            LENGTH(toto.Variable)
            - LENGTH( REPLACE ( toto.Variable, "CNH3-", "") ) 
        ) / LENGTH("CNH3-")        
    ) AS 'In test' 
FROM
(SELECT qm.IDAnalyseur , qm.Variable
				FROM
				    applicationqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listeaffectation AS lsta,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def,
            apprack AS rack,
            qmrack AS qmr
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lsta.NoSerieARM
				    AND lsta.NoSerieAnalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
            AND rack.idserieqm = qm.IDAnalyseur
            AND qmr.id = rack.idRack
            AND def.NomAnalyseur LIKE '%NH3%'
GROUP BY qm.IDAnalyseur, qm.Variable) AS toto

SELECT
"CTRSe" AS 'Analyser',
ROUND (   
        (
            LENGTH(toto.Variable)
            - LENGTH( REPLACE ( toto.Variable, "CTRS-", "") ) 
        ) / LENGTH("CNH3-")        
    ) AS 'In test' 
FROM
(SELECT qm.IDAnalyseur , qm.Variable
				FROM
				    applicationqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listeaffectation AS lsta,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def,
            apprack AS rack,
            qmrack AS qmr
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lsta.NoSerieARM
				    AND lsta.NoSerieAnalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
            AND rack.idserieqm = qm.IDAnalyseur
            AND qmr.id = rack.idRack
            AND def.NomAnalyseur LIKE '%CTRS%'
GROUP BY qm.IDAnalyseur, qm.Variable) AS toto

SELECT NomAnalyseur as 'Analyser', COUNT(IDAnalyseur) as 'In test'
FROM
(SELECT qm.IDAnalyseur, def.NomAnalyseur
				FROM
				    applicationqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listeaffectation AS lsta,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lsta.NoSerieARM
				    AND lsta.NoSerieAnalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
				    AND def.NomAnalyseur = "MP101M"
GROUP BY qm.IDAnalyseur, def.NomAnalyseur) AS TOTO
GROUP BY NomAnalyseur

SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(NomAnalyseur, "_Bc", "") as 'Analyser', COUNT(IDAnalyseur) as 'Double check'
FROM
(SELECT qm.IDAnalyseur, def.NomAnalyseur
				FROM
				    serieqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lst.KeyAnalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
            AND qm.QMStatus = 1
) AS TOTO
GROUP BY NomAnalyseur

SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(NomAnalyseur, "_Bc", "") as 'Analyser', COUNT(IDAnalyseur) as 'To be verified'
FROM
(SELECT qm.IDAnalyseur, def.NomAnalyseur
				FROM
				    serieqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lst.KeyAnalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
            AND qm.QMStatus = 2
) AS TOTO
GROUP BY NomAnalyseur
SELECT COUNT(IDAnalyseur) FROM serieqm WHERE QMStatus = 1
SELECT COUNT(IDAnalyseur) FROM serieqm WHERE QMStatus = 2

targets.expr:
SELECT *, ((tmp.valid/tmp.nb)*100.0) as percent FROM 
				(SELECT
					DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m") as dt,
					SUM(IF(qm.qmstatus=0,1,0)) as valid,
					SUM(IF(qm.qmstatus=3,1,0)) as rem,
					count(qm.qmstatus) AS nb
				FROM
				    serieqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
        GROUP BY dt) AS tmp
targets.rawSql:
SELECT STR_TO_DATE(dt, "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec, ((tmp.valid/(tmp.valid+tmp.rem))*100.0) as 'All' FROM 
				(SELECT
					DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01") as dt,
					SUM(IF(qm.qmstatus=0,1,0)) as valid,
					SUM(IF(qm.qmstatus=3,1,0)) as rem,
					count(qm.qmstatus) AS nb
				FROM
				    serieqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
				    AND qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom()
        GROUP BY dt) AS tmp

SELECT fulldata.time_sec,  AC32e FROM
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01"), "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec FROM serieqm as qm WHERE qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom() GROUP BY time_sec) AS fulldata
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(dt, "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec, ((tmp.valid/(tmp.valid+tmp.rem))*100.0) as 'AC32e' FROM 
				(SELECT
					DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01") as dt,
					SUM(IF(qm.qmstatus=0,1,0)) as valid,
					SUM(IF(qm.qmstatus=3,1,0)) as rem,
					count(qm.qmstatus) AS nb
				FROM
				    serieqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
				    AND qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom()
				    AND def.NomAnalyseur = "AC32e"
        GROUP BY dt) AS tmp) AS filterdata
ON fulldata.time_sec = filterdata.time_sec ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT fulldata.time_sec,  AF22e FROM
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01"), "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec FROM serieqm as qm WHERE qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom() GROUP BY time_sec) AS fulldata
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(dt, "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec, ((tmp.valid/(tmp.valid+tmp.rem))*100.0) as 'AF22e' FROM 
				(SELECT
					DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01") as dt,
					SUM(IF(qm.qmstatus=0,1,0)) as valid,
					SUM(IF(qm.qmstatus=3,1,0)) as rem,
					count(qm.qmstatus) AS nb
				FROM
				    serieqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.IDanalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
				    AND qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom()
				    AND def.NomAnalyseur = "AF22e"
        GROUP BY dt) AS tmp) AS filterdata
ON fulldata.time_sec = filterdata.time_sec ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT fulldata.time_sec,  CO12e FROM
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01"), "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec FROM serieqm as qm WHERE qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom() GROUP BY time_sec) AS fulldata
LEFT JOIN

ON fulldata.time_sec = filterdata.time_sec ORDER BY time_sec

panels.title: Valid test in one pass by analyzer

targets.rawSql:
SELECT fulldata.time_sec, Cumul FROM
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01"), "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec FROM serieqm as qm WHERE qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom() GROUP BY time_sec) AS fulldata
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01"), "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec, COUNT(lst.keyanalyseur) as 'Cumul'
				FROM
				    serieqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.QMStatus = 0
				    AND qm.IDanalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
				    AND qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom()
        GROUP BY time_sec) AS filterdata
ON fulldata.time_sec = filterdata.time_sec ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT fulldata.time_sec,  AC32e FROM
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01"), "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec FROM serieqm as qm WHERE qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom() GROUP BY time_sec) AS fulldata
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01"), "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec, COUNT(lst.keyanalyseur) as 'AC32e'
				FROM
				    serieqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.QMStatus = 0
				    AND qm.IDanalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
				    AND qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom()
				    AND def.NomAnalyseur = "AC32e"
        GROUP BY time_sec) AS filterdata
ON fulldata.time_sec = filterdata.time_sec ORDER BY time_sec

(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01"), "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec FROM serieqm as qm WHERE qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom() GROUP BY time_sec) AS fulldata
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(qm.dateQM, "%Y-%m-01"), "%Y-%m-%d") AS time_sec, COUNT(lst.keyanalyseur) as 'CTRSe'
				FROM
				    serieqm as qm,
				    listeanalyseur as lst,
				    listedefinitionanalyseur AS def
				WHERE
				    qm.QMStatus = 0
				    AND qm.IDanalyseur = lst.keyanalyseur
				    AND lst.IDanalyseur = def.idanalyseur
				    AND qm.dateQM >= $__timeFrom()

        GROUP BY time_sec) AS filterdata
ON fulldata.time_sec = filterdata.time_sec ORDER BY time_sec

targets.expr: sum((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes - node_memory_MemFree_bytes - node_memory_Cached_bytes - node_memory_Buffers_bytes - node_memory_Slab_bytes) * on(instance) group_left(node_name) node_meta{}) by (node_name)
100-sum((node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes) * on(instance) group_left(node_name) node_meta{} * 100) / count(node_meta * on(instance) group_left(node_name) node_meta{})
